titleStmt.title: The garden of pleasure containing several draughts of gardens, both in embroyder'd-ground-works, knot-works of grass, as likewise in wildernesses, and others : with their cuts in copper / by Andrew Mollet.
titleStmt.author: Mollet, André.

biblFull.extent: [8], 15 p., 30 leaves of plates (some folded) : ill.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for John Martyn, at the Bell without Temple-Barr, and Henry Herringman at the Anchor in the New-Exchange,
